survey_name: Corporate Sustainability and Green Office Practices Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee awareness and engagement with sustainability initiatives and green office practices within the organization.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point Likert scale for this question to measure awareness levels. Avoid neutral options to force direction.
